definition: Poyang county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
name of a lake
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Poyang Lake in Shangrao 上饒|上饶[Shang4 rao2], Jiangxi
Poyang county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

sentences.english: Sun then remembered his brother's words and asked the servant to send for Chou Yu at once.
sentences.chinese: 一句话提醒了孙权，马上派人到鄱阳请周瑜来。

sentences.english: The largest flock of 3, 000 birds dependson its winter habitat on Poyang Lake.
sentences.chinese: 多达3000只的鹤群在鄱阳湖过冬。

sentences.english: Poyang Lake district is rich in natural resources and has enormous exploitable potentialities.
sentences.chinese: 鄱阳湖区自然资源比较丰富，开发潜力大。

sentences.english: The number of fish species in Poyang Lake has already fallen by half.
sentences.chinese: 鄱阳湖鱼的种类已经减少了一半。

sentences.english: Numenius phaeopus is the new record in Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 中杓鹬为鄱阳湖保护区的新记录。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze factors affecting transmission of schistosomiasis japonica in Poyang Lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析鄱阳湖区日本血吸虫病传播的影响因素。

sentences.english: Poyang, Dongting and Honghu Lakes were in good shape.
sentences.chinese: 鄱阳湖，洞庭湖和洪湖本来都很好。

sentences.english: This catastrophe seriously threatened the wintering waterfowl Poyanghu Reserve by causing foods of waterfowl to decrease tremendously.
sentences.chinese: 这场洪灾使鄱阳湖保护区的越冬水禽受到了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The population of Siberian cranes in Poyang Lake will also be affected by the dam.
sentences.chinese: 鄱阳湖中白鹤的数量也因为三峡大坝的建设受到影响。

sentences.english: He is Cheng Guorong, 34, from Poyang County of Jiangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 犀利哥的真名叫程国荣，34岁，来自江西省鄱阳县。

sentences.english: Therefore, measures must be taken effectively in order to guarantee sustaining development of Poyan…
sentences.chinese: 必须采取各种有效措施确保鄱阳湖可持续发展。

sentences.english: Poyang lake in East China's Jiangxi Province is the country's largest freshwater lake.
sentences.chinese: 华东江西省的鄱阳湖是中国最大的淡水湖。

sentences.english: Conclusions There are various methods for schistosomiasis control in Poyang Lake region of Jiangxi Province and their effects are obvious.
sentences.chinese: 结论鄱阳湖区血吸虫病防治方法多样，效果明显。

sentences.english: The profit gained from raising rice was not well on the low farm land.
sentences.chinese: 鄱阳湖圩区的低洼农田，种植水稻的经济效益不高。

sentences.english: Pressure on the finless porpoise population on Poyang Lake comes from the high numbers of ships passing through and sand dredging.
sentences.chinese: 压力对江豚人口鄱阳湖来自大量的船只通过，沙疏浚。

sentences.english: Usually he will ride his boat everyday on Lake Poyang to go fishing.
sentences.chinese: 平常他每天都驾船在鄱阳湖上捕鱼。

definition: Duchang county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
Jiujiang prefecture-level city in Jiangxi/also Jiujiang county
Poyang county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

Yichun prefecture level city in Jiangxi

Yiyang county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
Anyi county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
Pengze county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
Wuning county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
Duchang county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
Yihuang county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
Dexing county level city in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
